channel.title: How do I import monero blockchain to GUI from a file?
channel.description:
So I downloaded the file from this guide. https://www.getmonero.org/resources/user-guides/importing_blockchain.html
What are the steps i have to take in order to import it in my GUI wallet on whonix?

item.title: How do I import monero blockchain to GUI from a file?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle this question is more suited for the Monero support?
